籤詩版本二:
Oyenda pansi akudandaula kuti nkovuta kumeza mpweya wawo.Pakachitika tsoka mwadzidzidzi, musayandikire.
Mbalame za m’nkhalango zokhala ndi zisa zosweka zilibe malo okhala, koma zimatha kupeza malo otetezeka m’kuya.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira mbalame ndi magpie zomwe zikuchoka m'nkhalango.
Chilichonse chiyenera kuchitidwa molingana ndi mtima wa munthu.
解曰: Ngati anthu amakhumudwa. Nthawi yotambasula. Khulupirirani kapena musakhulupirire. Khalani osamala ndikudikirira.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Qin Dezhi
Nyengo Yakumenyana. Su Qin akuchokera ku Luoyang. Lambirani Gui Guzi ngati mphunzitsi wake.
Anapempha Mfumu ya Qin ndipo analemba maulendo khumi ndi awiri koma sanavomerezedwe.
Jekete lachikopa lang'ambika ndipo ndalama zatha. Pita kunyumba uli wokhumudwa. Atabwerera kunyumba, mkazi wake sanamumvere ndipo mlamu wakeyo anakana kuphika.
Su Qin anali wamanyazi komanso wokwiya. Ndinalandira Taigong Yin Talisman (mutu wa bukulo) ndipo ndinaphunzira mwakhama.
Nditasokonezeka komanso kutopa, ndinabaya ntchafu yanga ndi chitsulo, ndipo zinandipweteka ndipo ndinawerenganso.
Pambuyo pake, adagwiritsa ntchito chiphunzitso cha mgwirizano kugwirizanitsa mayiko asanu ndi limodzi kuti amenyane ndi Qin. Pemphani Mfumu ya Zhao kuti ikhale nduna yayikulu ya maufumu asanu ndi limodzi.
聖意: Nyumbayo ikhala pachiwopsezo kaye, kenako mwayi, Samalani kufunafuna chuma ndi mwayi.Kugulitsa kumabweretsa mavuto m'banja.Liujia amuna oyenda pansi adzakhala olemera m'minda.Mbozi za silika zidzalemera.Ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi zidzalemera.Kufunafuna anthu adzatsogolera ku milandu Kudzakhala kovuta kusamuka (kutali) Nkovuta kuona zinthu zotayika ndi matenda.Kufunira zabwino mapiri ndi manda.
